description:
Hello! I'm relocating for work for 3 months and am looking to sublet my apartment. The apartment is spacious and fully furnished. The second bedroom is being used as an office/guest room. It has a twin sized daybed, and there's a large closet. The building is secure entry and there's a coin operated washer/dryer in the basement of the building. It's walking distance from restaurants, shops, and bars. M8/M14D bus stop is directly across the street.

You'll have access to the whole apartment. This includes the living room, kitchen, bathroom, bedroom, and office/guest room.

Feel free to contact me at any time during your stay! I will not be in the apartment during the time you're here, but I can definitely answer any questions you might have.

Across the street is the M14D/M8 bus stops. Union square (4,5,6, N,Q,R,L trains) is about a 20 minute walk or 10 minute bus ride.
name: Spacious 2 BR Apartment in East Village
